description: Find an existing reservation before modify/cancel. Always collect and pass BOTH customer_name and customer_phone exactly as spoken.

customer_name.description: Customer full name used to narrow phone matches.

customer_phone.description: Customer phone number used for primary booking lookup.

date.description: Optional booking date filter (YYYY-MM-DD) if user provides a date.

time.description: Optional booking time filter (HH:MM, 24-hour) if user provides time.

lookahead_days.description: Optional future search window in days (default 30).
